ModMetaData.name: RimHammer 40k - Contemptor Dreadnoughts
ModMetaData.author: sk4p3g04t
ModMetaData.description: The Contemptor Dreadnought is a massive warmachine piloted by a fallen battle brother of the adeptus astartes. Ancient, rare and immensly powerful, the contemptor is a remnant of bygone glory. To those who call themselves enemies of Mankind, the contemptor is doom 10,000 years in the making.
